member.name: P:Emergent.Toolbench.WorldBuilder.UI.Gamebryo.Properties.Resources.CreateEntityErrorReason
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to create an entity of type {0}. Please make sure that the model being used to create the entity is coming from a valid source; for example, the Entity Palette View. If you are still encountering this error, it is likely that you have conflicting model names coming from 2 or more separate model projects..
